titleStmt.title: By the Queene Where it is ordained and prouided by a statute, made and established in the Parliament holden at Westminster the eight day of Iune, in the eight and twentieth yeere of the raigne of the Queenes Maiesties dearely beloued father of famous memorie, King Henry the eight, that the prices of all kinde of wines, ...
Proclamations. 1591-12-17
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: by the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
Dated at end: Giuen at our palace of Westminster the seuenteenth day of December, in the foure and thirtieth yeere of our raigne.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London, England.
